data.command: tail -n 0 -f /var/log/messages /var/log/syslog | grep -Ei 'error_pattern_1|error_pattern_2' | while read line; do echo "$line" | mail -s "Error Detected" recipient@example.com; done

Monitor system resource usage (CPU, memory, disk, network) in real-time and log the data to a file.
data.command: while true; do top -b -n1 | grep --line-buffered "^CPU\|^Mem\|^Swap" >> system_resource_usage_log.txt; df -h >> system_resource_usage_log.txt; netstat -antp >> system_resource_usage_log.txt; sleep 5; done

data.invocation: Automate repetitive system administration tasks using a Bash script.
